name: Final Days of Our Lives
description:
Final Days of our Lives is a silly bootleg version of Final Days by Plus 7 Software(http://plus7software.com). The game was quickly thrown together using UFPS (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/ufps-ultimate-fps-2943)

Please check it out and definitely check out the real deal Final Days (https://store.steampowered.com/app/459830/Final_Days/)
